column1: #Text=Aang says : " Do you feel anything down there ? "
#Text=" Toph says : " There is something big , dense and made of metal deep in the heart of the volcano .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Sounds like a secret bunker to me .
#Text=" Sokka says : " What would we do without you ?
#Text=" Toph says : " Perish in burning hot magma .
#Text=" Toph says : " The tunnel continues on the other side and It leads right to the bunker .
#Text=" Sokka says : " We 'll have to be fast , but careful .
#Text=" Aang says : " How is that careful ?
#Text=We need to be fast , careful and lucky .
#Text=" Aang says : " Climb aboard and hold on tight .
